Iris.

* Iris would have shaken her head...if she would have had one.*

" Doesn't the Cybertronian Fire have them? Besides, the longer we dally the 
longer it's gunna take me to make the weapons.
Make them now and you'll have them later."


________________________________Zyber.

* Zyber backed a step at the creatures growl, jus wondering if it was his 
wounds that was making him so iritable.
But it really didn't matter how angry he got, he still wouldn't have the 
energy to hurt her if he tried.
It would take a good three weeks before he would be able to walk around 
without trouble, which gave her plenty of time to get to know him.
But she listened to his words with interest, still puzzled about how the 
Maximals could attack and gang up on a single bot.*

" Well, you have my sympathies for your wounds if nothing else. It is not 
fair to gang up on a single bot when he's not harming anyone."

* Zyber then gently took the cup from the cratures hands and walked back 
towards the fire, the tea no longer boiling thanks to the bowl.
The bowl was designed to only exert enough het through it to a temp that was 
hot enough to boil, the remainder of the time simply warding off the head 
and never getting any hotter.
Zyber dipped the cup into the amber tea, filling it and then walking back to 
the bed.
She held the cup out to the damaged bot sitting up on her bed, waiting 
calmly to take it from her hands.
Though, there was still one thing that they hadn't said to each 
other...their names.*

" Um...if you would be so kind as to answer...what is your name?"
